meanings.sent1: Pregnancy is divided into three trimesters.
meanings.sent2: The year is split into four seasons, while a year has four trimesters.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe how quickly the trimesters of the year pass by!
meanings.sent4: The trimesters of the year are like chapters in a book, each with its own story.
meanings.sent5: The changing colors of the leaves mark the passing of the trimesters.

meanings.definition: One of the three divisions of the academic year in some schools and universities.
meanings.sent1: The students eagerly awaited the start of the new trimester.
meanings.sent2: The school year is divided into semesters and trimesters.
meanings.sent3: The trimesters of the academic year always seem to fly by.
meanings.sent4: Each trimester brings new challenges and opportunities for learning.
meanings.sent5: The final exams mark the end of each trimester.
